fields.text: Rerolling Recipes
-Magic Item + 1 Perfect Gem (Any) -> Re-rolled Magic Item (item level 99)
-Rare Item + 1 Perfect Skull + 1 Jewel -> Re-rolled Rare Item (item level 99)
-Unique Weapon + Gheed's Fortune + 3 Perfect Gems (Any) -> Re-rolled Unique Weapon
-Unique Armor + Gheed's Fortune + 3 Perfect Gems (Any) -> Re-rolled Unique Armor
-Unique Ring + Gheed's Fortune + 3 Perfect Gems (Any) -> Re-rolled Unique Ring
-Unique Amulet + Gheed's Fortune + 3 Perfect Gems (Any) -> Re-rolled Unique Amulet
-Normal/Superior Class Specific Item |Staff|Wand|Scepter Low Rune (El - Dol) -> Re-rolled class skill automod item
Equipment Crafting Recipes
Jewelry
-Magic Amulet + 6 Perfect Gems (1 of each type) -> Chromatic Amulet (Buffed compared to Vanilla)
-Magic Ring + 1 Perfect Ruby + 1 Exploding Potion -> Garnet Ring
-Magic Ring + 1 Perfect Sapphire + 1 Thawing Potion -> Cobalt Ring
-Magic Ring + 1 Perfect Topaz + 1 Rejuvenation Potion -> Coral Ring
-Magic Ring + 1 Perfect Emerald + 1 Antidote Potion -> Jade Ring
Hit Power
-Magic Helm + 1 Jewel + 1 Ith Rune + 1 Perfect Sapphire -> Hit Power Helm
-Magic Boots + 1 Jewel + 1 Ral Rune + 1 Perfect Sapphire -> Hit Power Boots
-Magic Gloves + 1 Jewel + 1 Ort Rune + 1 Perfect Sapphire -> Hit Power Gloves
-Magic Belt + 1 Jewel + 1 Tal Rune + 1 Perfect Sapphire -> Hit Power Belt
-Magic Shield + 1 Jewel + 1 Eth Rune + 1 Perfect Sapphire -> Hit Power Shield
-Magic Body + 1 Jewel + 1 Nef Rune + 1 Perfect Sapphire -> Hit Power Body
-Magic Amulet + 1 Jewel + Thul Rune + 1 Perfect Sapphire -> Hit Power Amulet
-Magic Ring + 1 Jewel + 1 Amn Rune + 1 Perfect Sapphire -> Hit Power Ring
-Magic Weapon + 1 Jewel + 1 Tir Rune + 1 Perfect Sapphire -> Hit Power Weapon
-Unique Items (Weapon, Helm, Chest armor, Shield) + Io + Lum + Ko + Fal -> Unique Item with 1 socket
-Crafted Items (Weapon, Helm, Chest Armor, Shield) + Amn + Sol + Shael + Dol -> Crafted Item with 1 Socket
-Unsocketing | 1 Hel Rune + 1 Socketed Item -> Clear Sockets on Item and Destroy Socketed Items
-Unsocketing | 1 Hel Rune + 1 Ohm Rune or higher + 1 Socketed Item -> Clear Sockets on Item without Destroying Socketed Items
